benchmark_details.name: Automated but Risky Game: Modeling and Benchmarking Agent-to-Agent Negotiations and Transactions in Consumer Markets
benchmark_details.overview: This paper introduces an experimental framework to evaluate AI agentsâ€™ capabilities in real-world negotiation scenarios, investigating risks and performance disparities in fully automated agent-to-agent negotiations and transactions.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To systematically investigate outcomes and risks when AI agents are authorized to negotiate and make decisions on behalf of consumers and business owners.

data.source: Dataset compiled from 100 real consumer products in the categories of electronic devices, motor vehicles, and real estate.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on negotiation performances captured during experiments.
methodology.interpretation: Higher metrics indicate better negotiation performance.
